name: 4key Mania Pattern Speedtest
description:
This is really just a quick prototype I made of my second attempt at a rhythm game-type project in Unity. I may or may not update this periodically, but I wanted a tool to get my speed up in various patterns and random streams in 4-key rhythm games.

I'm uploading this pretty much just to try uploading.

(oh and i apologise for the obnoxious piano sounds, you can mute them with that toggle.)
